sentence.Network_en: He could not see the driver as the car nosed forward.

sentence.Network_en: If nothing else, Doug is a hard-nosed businessman.
sentence.Network_cn: 别的不说，道格起码是个精明务实的商人。

sentence.Network_en: Cartoons showed the Minister as a long-nosed Pinocchio.
sentence.Network_cn: 漫画把部长描画成长鼻子皮诺曹。
